---
name: Security issue
about: Report a security vulnerability (please email privately for critical issues)
title: "[SECURITY] "
labels: security
assignees: ''
---

## Severity
- [ ] Low (informational, minor weakness)
- [ ] Medium (exploitable under specific conditions)
- [ ] High (direct exploit with significant impact)
- [ ] Critical (affects all users, trivial to exploit)

## Description
Clear description of the security issue.

## Impact
What can an attacker do? What data or functionality is at risk?

## Proof of concept
Steps or code to demonstrate the vulnerability (if applicable).

## Mitigation
How should this be fixed?

## Disclosure
- [ ] I have not publicly disclosed this issue
- [ ] This issue is already public (provide link)

---

**For critical vulnerabilities**, please email the maintainer directly instead of filing a public issue.
